hero.title: Get Funded to Trade Our Capital
hero.subtitle: Access up to $200K in trading capital. Prove your skills, manage risk, and start earning real profits with our funded accounts program.

process.title: How Our Funding Process Works
process.subtitle: Follow our simple 4-step process to get funded and start trading with our capital.

step1.title: Choose Your Challenge
step1.description: Select from our three funding tiers based on your experience and capital goals.

step2.title: Prove Your Skills
step2.description: Meet the profit target while managing risk according to our guidelines.

step3.title: Get Verified
step3.description: Pass our verification process and receive your funded trading account.

step4.title: Start Earning
step4.description: Trade with our capital and keep up to 90% of the profits you generate.

tiers.title: Choose Your Funding Tier
tiers.subtitle: Select the challenge that matches your trading experience and capital goals.

success.title: Real Traders, Real Results
success.subtitle: Join thousands of successful traders who have already been funded through our program.

ali.name: Ali Hassan
ali.title: Professional Trader
ali.quote: The funding process was straightforward and the support team was incredibly helpful throughout my journey.

cezar.name: Cezar Ionut
cezar.title: Day Trader
cezar.quote: Within my first week, I had already made my first withdrawal. The platform is excellent for serious traders.

alamin.name: Al-Amin Kone
alamin.title: Swing Trader
alamin.quote: The risk management rules actually helped me become a more disciplined trader. Highly recommend!

risk.title: Risk Management Excellence
risk.subtitle: Our proven risk management framework protects both your progress and our capital.

dailyLimit.title: Daily Loss Limits
dailyLimit.description: Clear daily drawdown limits help maintain consistent risk management

totalLimit.title: Total Account Protection
totalLimit.description: Maximum loss limits ensure both trader and firm capital protection

profitTarget.title: Achievable Targets
profitTarget.description: Realistic profit targets that reward skill while managing expectations

cta.title: Ready to Get Funded?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of traders who are already trading with our capital and earning consistent profits.
